title: Brand new renovated house for sale in Dehiwela
details:
Brand new house located in Quarry Road Dehiwela,

5 mintue walk/1 minute walk to Mosque
located on a 25 feet road
Peaceful neighborhood

4 bed rooms, 3 bath rooms, Kitchen, Large upstairs and downstairs hall, Timber roofing, all mahogany treated timber, Maids room, one car park, front and back garden, Separate passage to walk right to the back
